sentences.sContent: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I think the feedback can be helpful because we all have blinders on when we fall in love, " says Eva Ritvo, a Miami psychiatrist who specialize sin marriage and family therapy.
sentences.sCn: 专门从事婚姻与家庭疗法研究的迈阿密精神病专家瑞塔沃说：“我认为信息回馈是有用的，因为人们在恋爱时都会变得盲目。

sentences.sContent: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.sContent_eng: The research work is being done by a small group of dedicated and imaginative scientists who specialize in extracting from various sea animals substances that may improve the health of the human race.
sentences.sCn: 一小部分富有想像力和敬业精神的科学家正在进行这项研究，他们专门研究从各种海洋动物中提取能增进人类健康的物质。

sentences.sContent: ...What does the woman specialize in at the moment...
...Competition from overseas led farmers to specialize and increase yields...

synos.tran: 专门从事；详细说明；特化
使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明

remMethod.val: spec(种类) + ial + ize(使) → 使成为特殊的种类 → 使专用于

words.tran: 专家的；专攻的；专门学科的
特使，特派人员；特刊；特色菜；专车；特价商品
专业，专长；特产；特性；招牌菜

专业化（等于specialization）；特化，适应化

使专门化；专攻；详细说明（specialise的过去分词）
使专门化；限定…的范围；深入（等于specialize）

trans.tranOther: to limit all or most of your study, business etc to a particular subject or activity

trans.tranCn: 使适应特殊目的， 使专用于
